extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • logError

        public void logError(ErrorCode eCode,
                     LoggingLevel level,
                     java.lang.String details)
        Logs the provided error. Attempts to use localized names for the error code and logging level. This only logs errors that are above or equal to the threshold.
        Parameters:
        eCode - The error code
        level - what level is the requested log
        details - additional information about the error

      • log

        public void log(LoggingLevel level,
                java.lang.String details)
        Logs the provided error. Attempts to use localized names for the logging level. This only logs information that is above or equal to the logging threshold.
        Parameters:
        level - what level is the requested log
        details - what to log

        public boolean disable()
        Description copied from interface: Node
